Note:
Cf. Walther (1959)
XWalther, Hans. Initia carmina ac versuum medii aevi posterioris latinorum. Göttingen, 1959; 2nd ed. 1969, no. 12366.
_description: Translation of a distich, ‘Ingenium dolus est, amor omnis ceca voluntas…’ — two couplets

CULKk424.Transcription:
Trewþe ys turnyd in-to trecheryechast loue in-to
                    lecheryepleye and solas to velenyeand holyday to glotonye
